data.title: Our locations and contacts worldwide: AMANN Group
data.meta_description: Along with the headquarters in Bönnigheim (Germany), AMANN has its own production sites, branches and agencies all over the world. Find all contacts here.
data.text:
Location & contacts

The headquarters of the AMANN Group are located in Bönnigheim, Germany. More than 2,500 motivated employees worldwide ensure the success and continued development of AMANN’s extensive portfolio. From universal sewing threads to innovative Smart Yarns – manufactured at our own production sites in Europe and Asia. You can find a list of competent contact persons here. We look forward to hearing from you.

Please select a continent:
